pages.text: 'Any technology advanced enough is indistinguishable from magic', you once heard.$(br)You are still not entirely sure how this storage system stores so many blocks in so little room, but since you're regularly running around with hundreds of mÂ² dirt, you never cared to question it.

pages.title: Growth Acceleration
pages.text: Looks like - despite the name implies - the $(thing)Crystal Growth Accelerator$() is not only able to grow Quartz! Other kinds of gemstones can be grown, too.

pages.title: Quartz Auto-Harvesting
pages.text: The $(l:magic/crystal_apothecary)Crystal Apothecary$() not only harvests $(thing)Gemstone Buds$(), but $(thing)Certus Quartz$(), too.

pages.title: Moving Budding Quartz
pages.text: Tools enchanted with $(l:enchantments/resonance)Resonance$() are able to harvest $(thing)Budding Quartz$(), while preserving their $(italic)flawless$() state.

pages.title: Anvil Crushing
pages.text: Lots of AE2's items can be crushed to dust using an anvil: $(thing)Certus Quartz$(), $(thing)Fluix$(), $(thing)Skystone$() and $(thing)Ender Pearls$().
In desperate need of $(thing)Charged Certus Quartz$()? $(l:resources/storm_stone)Storm Stones$() will charge them up in a heartbeat.

pages.title: Certus Crushing
pages.text: ...and then create $(thing)Fluix$() from it, if you get impatient.

pages.title: Certus Charging
pages.text: Being crystalline structures, $(thing)Certus Quartz$() and $(thing)Fluix Crystals$() can be grown in the Crystallarieum.
